title: The sullen lovers, or, The impertinents a comedy acted by His Highness the Duke of Yorkes servants / written by Tho. Shadwell.
author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Pages 83-84 are torn in filmed copy. Page 70-end photographed from Huntington Library copy and inserted at the end.
